sen.j: この頃から糸引き納豆も登場しており区別するために塩辛納豆を久喜と呼び糸引き納豆を単に納豆と呼ぶようになった。
sen.e: Around that time, itohiki natto also entered the stage and, in order to distinguish them, shiokara natto was called as kuki and itohiki natto as natto.

sen.e: Around that time, itohiki natto also emerged and, in order to distinguish them, shiokara natto was called kuki and itohiki natto was called natto.

sen.j: またこの頃北宋・南宋に渡航した僧が再度持ち帰り広めたことから寺納豆とも呼ばれるようになった。
sen.e: Also, around this time, priests who visited Northern Sung Dynasty and Southern Sung Dynasty brought back again and spread it, it became also called tera natto.

sen.e: Also, around this time, priests who visited the Northern Sung and Southern Sung dynasties brought it back and spread it, whereupon it also became known as tera natto.
